messages.title: THERESA MAY - STRONG AND STABLE LEADERSHIP
messages.content: I am proud to have been part of Theresa May's leadership election team last year and since then to have supported her in government. [...] I believe a strong Britain and I give that leadership the people expect. Whilst I voted to Remain in the EU, I believe we must respect the outcome of the British people. May is the candidate that is best placed to secure the best possible deal from Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Simon Kirby has campaigned long and hard for the £486 million redevelopment funding for the Royal Sussex County Hospital and is happy to report that the hospital redevelopment work is already underway.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: MILLIONS OF POUNDS OF GOVERNMENT FUNDING
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I have worked over the past seven years to bring in valuable government investment into the area, including [...] East Sussex Health Trust which received £75.5 million [...]

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest. [...] So as Prime Minister, I have ensured that my government has clearly set out our approach to Brexit through: My Lancaster House speech setting out the 12 point plan for Brexit [...]
issues.economy: Build a stronger economy that rewards people who work hard and creates secure and well-paid jobs.
issues.education: Providing real opportunity and support for all. We will give everyone a chance to get on in life, building a good school for every child, and ensuring every child has a loving stable home.
issues.health: Building a strong and secure NHS. Our NHS is a precious national service that we must protect and enhance for everyone.
issues.immigration: Control and reduce immigration. We will ensure that we can control and reduce immigration when we leave the European Union.

housing.content: Providing real opportunity and support for all. We will [...] ensure that the housing market works for all parts of our community.
